About me

I'm a versatile and enthusiastic software engineer with a proven ability to implement next-generation technologies.

I specialize in distributed computing, large-scale system design, and security. I take pride in being an enthusiastic, team oriented problem solver who can take charge and own a product from start to finish.

Projects

Air "vector" Miles 2d & 3d

A modernized loomk at the Mercator projection in 2d & 3d City names in the Western Hemisphere are shown in red. Routes, instead of being great circles, are straight lines on the Mercator map. It's very easy to plot a route on the 2d Mercator map, however φ = 2 arctan e^y − π/2 must be added to plot it in 3D. To activate that formula simply check "Use 3D Display."

See Live Source Code
